Question
========
What is the name of the model building procedure where predictors are incrementally added to the model based on the highest (partial) correlation with the outcome variable, without removing predictors again?

Answerlist
----------
* *Forward selection*.
* *Backward elimination*.
* *Stepwise regression*.
* *Block selection*.
